item.title: Is ther any way to put ur server online without router? :)
item.dc:creator: @KingCjownz KingCjownz
item.description:
@KingCjownz wrote:

go to www.hamachi.cc
download hamachi then download a source.
open up the source and click runserver.bat
open up hamachi.Make your network.
Post on server status page.
open up moparscape and choose your name and pass…
log in as ip 127.0.0.1 only you can use this everyone else has to log on your network and copy ur ip to there ip in moparscape.

Weldone your in your server…

have fun

Read full topic
